description: Rick Osborne's collection of type definitions which I've found helpful across many projects.
name: @rickosborne/typical

scripts.build: tsc -b tsconfig.cjs.json tsconfig.module.json tsconfig.types.json && cp ../static/esm-package.json dist/esm/package.json && cp ../static/cjs-package.json dist/cjs/package.json
scripts.postbuild: npm run repackage && npm run doc
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run type-check
scripts.prepub: npm run build && npm run lint
scripts.prepub:dry-run: npm run build && npm run lint
scripts.prepublish: npm run build && npm run lint
